item.title: About
item.description: My name is Adrian Segura-Moreiras and I graduated in Economics at UPF where I am currently studying a Bachelors of Law. My research interests lie in the Law and Economics discipline. In particular, I am interested in the study of judges behaviour and its determinants, in the analysis of tort law from an economic perspective and about how the innovative tech processes have shapen the current state of law disciplines.
